name: NOS Microsystems
tag_list: download, manager, compression, transfer, management, installation, decompression, virtual, bundling
overview:
NOS Microsystems is a specialist in electronic software distribution. A market leader in both download management technology and compression. Technology from NOS Microsystems is used to service over 1 billion downloads annually for various clients.

Since 2001 NOS Microsystems have been developing and delivering completely customized transfer management and compression solutions to companies around the globe. Over the past 9 years NOS Microsystems has successfully afforded delivery of some of the most commonly-accessed digital goods in the world, including Adobeâ€™s Reader and Flash.

More recently, in successful collaboration with their partners (search, anti-virus, e-commerce etc.), NOS Microsystems has enabled its clients to monetize their traffic in cases where this was not previously possible. By acting as both a technological enabler and broker, NOS Microsystems has allowed clients to unlock the potential of this oft-overlooked asset.
